GS40rasarnpu:0: Prathamaḥ paṭalaḥ yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataśca yaḥ /

GS40rasarnpu:2355: ṣaṇmāse tu vyatikrānte sa ghaṭaḥ kāñcanaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.146 //
GS40rasarnpu:2357: prativāpe niṣiñcet tat hema tāmrasamaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.147 //
GS40rasarnpu:2360: sparśavedhe tu sā jñeyā sarvakāryārthasādhinī // Ras_12.149 //
GS40rasarnpu:2361: śastracchinnā mahādevi dagdhā vā pāvakena tu /
GS40rasarnpu:2362: prarohati kṣaṇāddivyā dagdhā chinnā mahauṣadhī // Ras_12.150 //
GS40rasarnpu:2363: raktaṃ pītaṃ sitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tasyāḥ puṣpaṃ prajāyate /
GS40rasarnpu:2365: sā sthitā gomatītīre gaṅgāyām arbude girau /
GS40rasarnpu:2366: ujjayinyā dakṣiṇato vanānteṣu ca dṛśyate // Ras_12.152 //
GS40rasarnpu:2368: tāmbūlena samaṃ kṛtvā guṭikāṃ kārayedbudhaḥ // Ras_12.153 //
GS40rasarnpu:2370: sahasraṃ vedhayitvā tu kāñcanaṃ kurute kṣaṇāt // Ras_12.154 //
GS40rasarnpu:2373: kaṭutumbīti vikhyātāṃ devi divyauṣadhīṃ śṛṇu // Ras_12.156 //
GS40rasarnpu:2374: tasyā bījāni saṃgṛhya sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet // Ras_12.157 //
GS40rasarnpu:2377: bījaṃ yantre vinikṣipya tailaṃ saṃgṛhya paṇḍitaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2378: rasaṃ mūrchāpayet tena cakramardena mardayet // Ras_12.159 //
GS40rasarnpu:2380: tāratulyāni caitāni sarveṣāṃ sūtakaḥ samaḥ // Ras_12.160 //
GS40rasarnpu:2386: bhūgataṃ māsamekaṃ tu tāraṃ kāñcanatāṃ nayet // Ras_12.162:2 //
GS40rasarnpu:2388: śulvasya pañcabhāgaṃ ca bījasyaikaṃ ca yojayet // Ras_12.163 //
GS40rasarnpu:2389: ete dvādaśa bhāgāḥ syuḥ sarvaṃ taddhārayet kṣitau /
GS40rasarnpu:2390: sthānasyāsya niṣekaṃ tu bhūdaṇḍena tu kārayet // Ras_12.164 //
GS40rasarnpu:2394: bhagnam etacchravet kṣīraṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam // Ras_12.167 //
GS40rasarnpu:2398: tasya kṣīraṃ tu saṃgṛhya tāraṃ nirvāpayedbudhaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2399: dhameddhavāgninā caiva jāyate hema śobhanam // Ras_12.169 //
GS40rasarnpu:2401: mardayet pāradaṃ prājño rasabandho bhaviṣyati // Ras_12.170 //
GS40rasarnpu:2402: toyamadhye vinikṣipya guṭikā vajravad bhavet // Ras_12.171 //
GS40rasarnpu:2406: milanti sarvalohāni dravanti salilaṃ yathā // Ras_12.173 //
GS40rasarnpu:2409: śākavṛkṣasya niryāsaṃ pattre tasya ca gālayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2410: śigrumūlasya cūrṇaṃ tu tadrasena vimardayet // Ras_12.175 //
GS40rasarnpu:2414: tadrasena yutaṃ prājñaḥ saptarātraṃ tu bhāvayet // Ras_12.177 //
GS40rasarnpu:2416: lepayet tārapattrāṇi dhmātaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.178 //
GS40rasarnpu:2418: sā śvetā vyādhināśe ca kṛṣṇā pītā rasāyane // Ras_12.179 //
GS40rasarnpu:2422: mūrchayed bandhayet kṣipraṃ śulvaṃ hema karoti ca // Ras_12.181 //
GS40rasarnpu:2424: toyena marditaṃ kṛtvā vaṅgaṃ stambhayati kṣaṇāt // Ras_12.182 //
GS40rasarnpu:2425: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śvetaguñjāvidhiṃ priye // Ras_12.183 //
GS40rasarnpu:2427: kapāle mṛttikāṃ nyasya secayet salilena tu // Ras_12.184 //
GS40rasarnpu:2429: vakṣyamāṇena mantreṇa kuryāt saṃgrahaṇaṃ tathā // Ras_12.185 //
GS40rasarnpu:2430: namo bhagavati śvetavalli śvetaparvatavāsini sarvakāryāṇi kuru kuru apratihate namo namaḥ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2432: ṣaṇmāsena tathā vallīṃ mantrapūtena rakṣayet // Ras_12.186 //
GS40rasarnpu:2433: śuddhaśulvaṃ tu saṃgṛhya mūṣāmadhye tu saṃsthitam /
GS40rasarnpu:2437: devānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ devi jāyate hema śobhanam // Ras_12.188 //
GS40rasarnpu:2445: nirgacchati mahīṃ bhittvā candravṛddhyā vivardhate // Ras_12.192 //
GS40rasarnpu:2448: ahorātroṣito bhūtvā baliṃ tatra nivedayet // Ras_12.193 //
GS40rasarnpu:2449: pūrṇamāsyāṃ ca rātrau ca gatvā tasya samīpataḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2453: candrodaye tato dṛṣṭe kṣīraṃ tasya tu dāpayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2457: candrodakena gaganaṃ rasaṃ hema ca mardayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2459: ayaṃ ca sparśamātreṇa lohānyaṣṭau ca vedhayet // Ras_12.198 //
GS40rasarnpu:2461: catuḥṣaṣṭyaṃśataḥ piṇḍe dviguṇe tu sahasrakam // Ras_12.199 //
GS40rasarnpu:2463: trilohaveṣṭitaṃ vaktre dhṛtvā cādṛśyatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.200 //
GS40rasarnpu:2464: oṃ namo rudrāya daṃṣṭrotkaṭāya vighnanāśāya diśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa vidiśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa rudro vijñāpayati huṃ phaṭ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2465: oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya triśūlahastāya amṛtodbhavāya rakṣa rakṣa phaṭ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2470: te bhūmau patitā divyāḥ saṃjātāḥ kartarīrasaḥ // Ras_12.203 //
GS40rasarnpu:2471: rakṣārthaṃ sthāpitaṃ tatra viṣṇunā ca sudarśanam /
GS40rasarnpu:2473: kurute garjitaṃ nādaṃ dhūmaṃ jvālāṃ vimuñcati /
GS40rasarnpu:2476: sā jvālākartarī caiva śaktirghorasya kartarī // Ras_12.206 //
GS40rasarnpu:2478: rasarūpā mahāghorā asiddhānāṃ tu chedinī // Ras_12.207 //
GS40rasarnpu:2479: tasyāḥ kṣetraṃ yadā gacchet aghorāstraṃ japettadā /
GS40rasarnpu:2482: mudrayā mudrayettāṃ tu aghorāstreṇa yojitām // Ras_12.209 //
GS40rasarnpu:2484: viṣṭarāmudrayā tāṃ tu sthānayogaṃ niyojayet // Ras_12.210 //
GS40rasarnpu:2485: kañcukī tu śilā krāntā kumārī vajrakandakam /
GS40rasarnpu:2486: yoṣidraktaṃ gavāṃ mūtraṃ tilakaḥ sarvavaśyakṛt // Ras_12.211 //
GS40rasarnpu:2491: keśāḥ kṣiptāḥ sphuṭantyasmin ātmacchāyā na dṛśyate // Ras_12.214 //
GS40rasarnpu:2492: tailaṃ ca golakākāraṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva visarpati /
GS40rasarnpu:2493: gandhakasya haredgandhaṃ lavaṇāmlaṃ ca jāyate // Ras_12.215 //
GS40rasarnpu:2495: viṣodakaṃ gandhakaṃ ca harabījaṃ ca tatsamam // Ras_12.216 //
GS40rasarnpu:2499: anena vidhinā devi nāgaḥ sindūratāṃ vrajet /
GS40rasarnpu:2500: sahasrāṃśena tasyaivaṃ tāraṃ vedhaṃ pradāpayet // Ras_12.218 //
GS40rasarnpu:2501: raktaṃ pītaṃ tathā kṛṣṇam uttarottarakāryakṛt // Ras_12.219 //
GS40rasarnpu:2503: gṛhītvā pūrvavat pattraiḥ pālāśair veṣṭayedbahiḥ // Ras_12.220 //
GS40rasarnpu:2505: mahiṣīkṣīramadhye tu bindumekaṃ tu sādhayet // Ras_12.221 //
GS40rasarnpu:2509: meṣaśṛṅgīṃ ca śṛṅgīṃ ca kṛṣṇonmattaṃ ca mārakam // Ras_12.223:1 //
GS40rasarnpu:2513: tena nāgaṃ pratīvāpya ṣoḍaśāṃśena sambhavet // Ras_12.224 //
GS40rasarnpu:2517: taccūrṇaṃ tu śatāṃśena tārapattrāṇi vedhayet // Ras_12.226 //
GS40rasarnpu:2519: niṣiktaṃ tacca varte 'yaṃ tāraṃ bhavati śobhanam // Ras_12.227 //
GS40rasarnpu:2523: andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ nirbījaṃ kanakaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.228:2 //
GS40rasarnpu:2529: etat kalkaṃ palamātraṃ cauṣadhyā lepanaṃ kuru /
GS40rasarnpu:2530: niryāse tu puṭaṃ kuryāt trivāraṃ hema śobhanam // Ras_12.231 //
GS40rasarnpu:2535: tayā saṃjīvitā daityā ye mṛtā devasaṃgare // Ras_12.234 //
GS40rasarnpu:2536: nikṣiptā martyaloke sā samyak te kathayāmyaham // Ras_12.235 //
GS40rasarnpu:2538: nadī godāvarī nāma prasiddhā jāhnavī yathā // Ras_12.236 //
GS40rasarnpu:2539: dakṣiṇe ca taṭe tasyāḥ kadalīnagaraṃ param /
GS40rasarnpu:2540: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ śailaḥ sarvalokeṣu viśrutaḥ // Ras_12.237 //
GS40rasarnpu:2549: tasya mantraṃ pravakṣyāmi triṣu lokeṣu durlabham // Ras_12.242 //
GS40rasarnpu:2550: oṃ caṇḍāya pinākine śūlahastāya oṃ diśāṃ bandhaya vidiśāṃ bandhaya ṭhaṭhaḥ
GS40rasarnpu:2555: oṃ namo 'mṛte 'mṛtarūpiṇi amṛtaṃ me kuru kuru evaṃ rudra ājñāpayati svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2560: jīvet kalpāyutaṃ sāgraṃ kāmarūpo mahābalaḥ // Ras_12.246 //
GS40rasarnpu:2562: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ svecchācāraḥ sa khecaraḥ // Ras_12.247 //
GS40rasarnpu:2564: mardayettena toyena saptavāraṃ tu svedayet // Ras_12.248 //
GS40rasarnpu:2565: sa rasaḥ sarvalohāni ṣaṣṭyaṃśena tu vedhayet // Ras_12.249 //
GS40rasarnpu:2566: athavā taṃ rasaṃ divyaṃ madhunā saha bhakṣayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2568: tasya mūtramalasvedaiḥ śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.251 //
GS40rasarnpu:2570: pītamātre bhavenmūrchā svāsthyaṃ syāt praharatrayāt // Ras_12.252 //
GS40rasarnpu:2577: svedayet saptarātraṃ tu trilohena ca veṣṭayet // Ras_12.256 //
GS40rasarnpu:2581: payasā ca samāyuktaṃ nityamevaṃ tu kārayet // Ras_12.258 //
GS40rasarnpu:2583: paśyeduṣṇodakaṃ yatra vāsaṃ tatraiva kārayet // Ras_12.259 //
GS40rasarnpu:2585: tasyā uttarabhāge tu sahyādriḥ puṇyaparvataḥ // Ras_12.260 //
GS40rasarnpu:2587: tasmāduttarato devi kampākhyaṃ nagaraṃ param // Ras_12.261 //
GS40rasarnpu:2589: praṇītākhyā nadī tatra snātvā vai sādhakottamaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2590: paścāduṣṇodake kuṇḍe vidhiṃ kuryād yathoditaḥ // Ras_12.262 //
GS40rasarnpu:2596: tasya mūtrapurīṣeṇa śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.265 //
GS40rasarnpu:2599: śulvaṃ ca mardayet sarvaṃ naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇena tu /
GS40rasarnpu:2600: tena lepitamātreṇa śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.267 //
GS40rasarnpu:2601: niṣiktaṃ tena toyena prativāpaṃ daded budhaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2602: śulvaṃ ca jāyate hema taruṇādityavarcasam // Ras_12.268 //
GS40rasarnpu:2604: tāraṃ cānena mārgeṇa niṣiktaṃ hematāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.269 //
GS40rasarnpu:2612: uṣṇodakena saṃmardya dhamanāt khoṭatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.273 //
GS40rasarnpu:2615: yāvat palaṃ tasya malaiḥ śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.274 //
GS40rasarnpu:2619: pāyasaṃ kāntapātre tan māsam ekaṃ tu bhakṣayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2620: bhuktvā jīvet kalpaśataṃ vaiṣṇavāyur bhavennaraḥ // Ras_12.276 //
GS40rasarnpu:2622: kardamāpo mahīśailaṃ śilaṃ ceti caturvidham // Ras_12.277 //
GS40rasarnpu:2625: kṣiptaṃ yadā bhavet kāṣṭhaṃ śailībhūtaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GS40rasarnpu:2626: bahirantaśca deveśi vedhakaṃ tat prakīrtitam // Ras_12.279 //
GS40rasarnpu:2627: hiṅgulaṃ haritālaṃ ca gandhakaṃ ca manaḥśilā /
GS40rasarnpu:2628: eṣāṃ gandhāpahāraṃ yat kurute tacca vedhakam // Ras_12.280 //
GS40rasarnpu:2629: gandhakaṃ tālakaṃ caiva toyapūrṇe ghaṭe kṣipet /
GS40rasarnpu:2631: anyathā veṣṭakaṃ devi tadagrāhyaṃ nirarthakam // Ras_12.281 //
GS40rasarnpu:2634: ekāhe vedhakaṃ tatra gokarṇe tu dinatrayam // Ras_12.282 //
GS40rasarnpu:2636: dhāreśvare pākṣikaṃ syāt varṣāpuryāṃ dinaikataḥ // Ras_12.283 //
GS40rasarnpu:2637: brahmeśvare māsikaṃ syāt vyāghrapuryāṃ tu vāsaram /
GS40rasarnpu:2638: aghoreśe māsikaṃ tu siṃhadvīpe tathā punaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2639: dinamekaṃ brahmagirau vindhye tu kṣaṇavedhakam // Ras_12.284 //
GS40rasarnpu:2643: bhūśailamasti tatraiva tridinaṃ vedhi parvate // Ras_12.286 //
GS40rasarnpu:2648: amṛtaṃ tatra tatrāpi vajrīkaraṇam uttamam // Ras_12.288 //
GS40rasarnpu:2649: tasyotpattiṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā jānanti sādhakāḥ // Ras_12.289 //
GS40rasarnpu:2651: yaḥ svedaḥ patitastasmāj jātaṃ śailodakaṃ param // Ras_12.290 //
GS40rasarnpu:2652: tanmukhe kṣaṇikaṃ jātaṃ kroḍadeśe tu vāsaram /
GS40rasarnpu:2653: bāhubhyāṃ tryahavedhi syāt māsavedhi tu pārśvayoḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2654: ṣaṇmāsamaparāṅge ca sarvaṃ samaphalaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.291 //
GS40rasarnpu:2655: aghorāstreṇa tatkṣetra- rakṣāṃ kṛtvā diśāṃ balim /
GS40rasarnpu:2656: dattvā lakṣaṃ japitvā tu gṛhṇīyādamṛtaṃ param // Ras_12.292 //
GS40rasarnpu:2659: śailāmbupalamaṣṭau tu palaṃ kṣīrasya nikṣipet // Ras_12.293 //
GS40rasarnpu:2663: kṣīrāvaśeṣaṃ seveta pūrvoktaṃ labhate phalam // Ras_12.295 //
GS40rasarnpu:2668: dvir aṣṭavarṣakākāraḥ sahasrāyur na saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.297 //
GS40rasarnpu:2670: bhakṣayed varṣam ekaṃ tu māsenāyutajīvitaḥ // Ras_12.298 //
GS40rasarnpu:2672: māsamekaṃ tato mardyaṃ dehasiddhiṃ karoti ca // Ras_12.299 //
GS40rasarnpu:2677: athavā sūtakaṃ devi vāriṇā saha mardayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2680: athavā taṃ rasaṃ hemnā hemabhasma tato balī /
GS40rasarnpu:2683: kartā hartā svayaṃ siddho jīveccandrārkatārakam // Ras_12.305 //
GS40rasarnpu:2684: kunaṭī cābhramākṣīkaṃ hema tāraṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2685: tat sarvaṃ payasā kṣīrair madyaṃ pācyaṃ dinatrayam /
GS40rasarnpu:2689: paktvā tenāmbhasā pathyāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ trīṇi śatāni ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2690: madhu saṃyojya bhāṇḍasthaṃ bhūmau sarvaṃ nidhāpayet // Ras_12.308 //
GS40rasarnpu:2695: kūṣmāṇḍaṃ māritaṃ kṛtvā yāni kāni phalāni ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2702: kālena triguṇenaiva kāṭhinyaṃ tasya jāyate // Ras_12.313 //
GS40rasarnpu:2703: ṣaṇmāsaṃ tanmukhe dhāryaṃ vajrakāyaṃ karoti ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2704: daśanāgasamaprāṇo devaiḥ saha ca modate // Ras_12.314 //
GS40rasarnpu:2706: yadā bhavati tacchailaṃ gṛhītvā cūrṇayet tataḥ // Ras_12.315 //
GS40rasarnpu:2708: bhakṣayedvarṣamekaṃ tu tataḥ kṣīrāśano bhavet // Ras_12.316 //
GS40rasarnpu:2711: pāradaṃ haritālaṃ ca śilā mākṣikameva ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2712: daradaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva sarvamekatra kārayet // Ras_12.318 //
GS40rasarnpu:2714: golakaṃ kārayitvā tu vārimadhye nidhāpayet // Ras_12.319 //
GS40rasarnpu:2715: tena tāraṃ ca śulvaṃ ca kāñcanaṃ bhavati dhruvam // Ras_12.320 //
GS40rasarnpu:2721: jñātvā kālapramāṇena bandhayet pāradaṃ tataḥ // Ras_12.323 //
GS40rasarnpu:2723: śatāṃśena tu lohānāṃ sarveṣāṃ hemakārakam // Ras_12.324 //
GS40rasarnpu:2725: tatkālaṃ cittajātānām ūrdhvaṃ bhavati cānilaḥ // Ras_12.325 //
GS40rasarnpu:2728: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre divyatvaṃ labhate dhruvam // Ras_12.327 //
GS40rasarnpu:2729: nicule kakubhe caiva kiṃśuke madhuke 'pi vā /
GS40rasarnpu:2732: pācayeddinamekaṃ tu hemnā saṃveṣṭya dhārayet // Ras_12.329 //
GS40rasarnpu:2734: pādena kanakaṃ dattvā pāradaṃ tatra yojayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2736: pūrvavat sāraṇā kāryā pūrvavat siddhidā bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2737: dhāryamāṇā mukhe sā tu sahasrāyuṣkarī bhavet // Ras_12.331 //
GS40rasarnpu:2739: dhāryamāṇā mukhe seyam ayutāyuḥpradā bhavet // Ras_12.332 //
GS40rasarnpu:2741: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre lakṣāyurjāyate naraḥ // Ras_12.333 //
GS40rasarnpu:2742: caturthīṃ sāraṇāṃ prāpya koṭivedho na saṃśayaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2743: koṭyāyurjīvitaṃ tasya khecaratvaṃ ca labhyate // Ras_12.334 //
GS40rasarnpu:2744: pañcabhir daśakoṭiḥ syāt ṣaḍbhiḥ koṭiśataṃ bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2746: dadāti saptamīṃ sāpi sāraṇāṃ guṭikā parā /
GS40rasarnpu:2747: khecarī nāma vikhyātā bhairaveṇa pracoditā // Ras_12.336 //
GS40rasarnpu:2750: krīḍate khecarair bhogaiḥ svecchayā śivatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.337 //
GS40rasarnpu:2752: tadbaddhaṃ pāradaṃ caiva guṭikāṃ śṛṇu sundari // Ras_12.338 //
GS40rasarnpu:2754: triguṇe gandhake jīrṇe tena hema tu kārayet // Ras_12.339 //
GS40rasarnpu:2755: kārayedbhasma sūtaṃ tu kāñcanaṃ tatra sūtakam /
GS40rasarnpu:2756: tadbhasma sūtake jāryaṃ rasendrasya same samam // Ras_12.340 //
GS40rasarnpu:2759: tadbhasma jārayate sūte triguṇe tu surārcite /
GS40rasarnpu:2760: hāṭake sārayettaṃ tu guṭikāṃ tena kārayet // Ras_12.342 //
GS40rasarnpu:2761: trilohāveṣṭitaṃ taṃ tu mukhe prakṣipya sādhakaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2762: naṣṭacchāyo bhavet so 'yam adṛśyo devadānavaiḥ // Ras_12.343 //
GS40rasarnpu:2766: vaktre kare ca bibhṛyāt sarvāyudhanivāraṇāt // Ras_12.345 //
GS40rasarnpu:2770: vaktrasthā nāśayet sākṣāt palitaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2772: hema tāraṃ tathā bhānuṃ samabhāgāni kārayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2775: raṇe rājakule dyūte divye kāmye jayo bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2776: yanmukhe caiva tadgolaṃ sa sarvarañjako bhavet // Ras_12.349 //
GS40rasarnpu:2781: rogamṛtyujarā hanti vaktrasthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.351 //
GS40rasarnpu:2783: trayo gaganabhāgāḥ syur ekaikaṃ hemakāntayoḥ // Ras_12.352 //
GS40rasarnpu:2788: mākṣikasya palaṃ caiva śilājatupalaṃ punaḥ // Ras_12.354 //
GS40rasarnpu:2790: ekīkṛtyātha tat sarvaṃ madhvājyena tu peṣayet // Ras_12.355 //
GS40rasarnpu:2796: āmalakyādi kāntaṃ ca pāradaṃ ca manaḥśilām /
GS40rasarnpu:2799: māṣaṃ trimāṣaṃ triguṇaṃ bhakṣayettu krameṇa tu /
GS40rasarnpu:2801: ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau ca varṣāṇi kramān niṣkapramāṇataḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2802: bhuñjīta sa ca divyānnaṃ jarāvairūpyavarjitaḥ // Ras_12.361 //
GS40rasarnpu:2804: yo bhakṣayet tribhirvarṣaiḥ sarvavyādhīn jayatyalam // Ras_12.362 //
GS40rasarnpu:2806: ṣoḍaśe vatsare devi divyarūpaḥ sa jāyate // Ras_12.363 //
GS40rasarnpu:2807: śatapalam abhayānām akṣadhātryos tathaiva kvathitajalaśatāṣṭau bhāgamaṣṭāvaśeṣam /
GS40rasarnpu:2808: ghṛtamadhusitayāḍhyaṃ vyoṣacitraṃ daśāṃśaṃ rasaphalarasasiddhaṃ lohajīrṇaṃ mṛtaṃ ca // Ras_12.364
GS40rasarnpu:2812: vigatasakaladoṣaḥ sarvadigdivyacakṣuḥ madana iva sukāntiḥ kāminīnāṃ pravīraḥ // Ras_12.366
GS40rasarnpu:2814: vṛṣabhagativiceṣṭaḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣaḥ suragaja iva loke śrāntihantāśu nityam // Ras_12.367
GS40rasarnpu:2815: prabhavati khalu loke somatārārkajīvī kamalasadanasuśrīr nyāyaśāstrādivettā /
GS40rasarnpu:2818: śailavārivarasiddhagolakaṃ sundaraṃ hy amararañjakaṃ śubham // Ras_12.369
GS40rasarnpu:2821: śailatāṃ gatamathāhitaṃ mukhe vajrakāyakaram alpavāsaraiḥ // Ras_12.370 //
GS40rasarnpu:2825: triḥsaptarātraṃ dinamekamekaṃ sahasrajīvī vijayī naraḥ syāt // Ras_12.372
GS40rasarnpu:2827: hāṭakena samāyuktaṃ guṭikā khecarī bhavet // Ras_12.373 //
GS40rasarnpu:2835: triṃśatsahasraṃ padme ca lakṣamāmalake punaḥ // Ras_12.377 //
GS40rasarnpu:2839: rase rasāyane caiva lakṣavedhī na saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.379 //
GS40rasarnpu:2842: ṣaṇmāsena prayogeṇa hy ajarāmaratāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.380 //
GS40rasarnpu:2844: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre adṛśyo bhavati dhruvam // Ras_12.381 //
GS40rasarnpu:2846: rasenaiva tu kāle tu kuryādeva rasāyanam // Ras_12.382 //
